tree.name: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander
tree.tradeDescription: Thunder acquire SGA, Gallinari, and massive pick haul from Clippers for Paul George

assetsGivenUp.name: Paul George
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Indiana for Victor Oladipo and Domantas Sabonis
assetsGivenUp.note: 7x All-Star, MVP candidate. Only played 2 seasons in OKC

assetsGivenUp.name: Victor Oladipo
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Orlando for Serge Ibaka
assetsGivenUp.note: 2x All-Star, became MIP after leaving OKC

assetsGivenUp.name: Serge Ibaka
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted 24th overall by Seattle SuperSonics (became OKC Thunder)
assetsGivenUp.note: Elite rim protector, 3x All-Defense. Drafted by Seattle, rights held by OKC

assetsGivenUp.name: Domantas Sabonis
assetsGivenUp.note: 2x All-Star, son of Arvydas Sabonis. Traded after rookie season
